Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: pauseTimer
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: If shouldPauseUI is enabled, this is how long a pauseForUIDebug() call lasts (in seconds).

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: pauseForUIDebug()
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: if pauseForUIDebug is enabled, then this will pause for pauseTimer seconds

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: topVCType
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Tells you the type of the top ViewController

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: topVC
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Gets you the VC that is the currently visible VC (top)

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: topVCScreenshot
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Takes a screenshot and returns the filename that it wrote to (which contains the topVCType)

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: tabBarVC
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Gets you a reference to the TabBarVC for the app (so you can set

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: topVC
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Gets you the VC that is the currently visible VC (top)

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: getVisibleViewController(_:)
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Traverses the provided rootViewController to find the currently visible view controller.

Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.name: presentModally(viewController:)
Classes/UITestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestK.abstract: Modally presents the provided view controller (without animations).

Classes/TestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestKit.name: waitForDuration(_:)
Classes/TestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestKit.abstract: Waits for the desired amount of time (and frees up the UI thread while it waits)

Classes/TestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestKit.name: waitForCondition(_:timeout:)
Classes/TestKitBase.html#/c:@M@UITestKit.abstract: Waits for the provided condition block to evaluate to true, or the timeout amount of time to elapse.

Classes/TestKitBase.html.name: TestKitBase
Classes/TestKitBase.html.abstract: A Base Class that provides some very basic functions for sleeping arbitrarily and waiting for a specific condition to occur (or timing out if that doesn’t happen)
